channel.title: Rune-Spice 2007 REMAKE
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A0kDZ5t.png[/img]
[URL=http://rune-spice.com/forums/]Website[/URL] [URL=http://uppit.com/ayz8tsibawsp/client.zip]Play[/URL]
Okay i would like to start off with this is a learning experience so don't come on here and start flaming and such.
Welcome to Rune-Spice. We are a community with an aim of restoring the land of Glienor; the amazing content in our game is sure to entertain any Nostalgic player who longs to re-live the 'golden age'. We have taken the time and efforts to present flawless and smooth game-play when our official server is launched.
What you see and read about below is exactly what you will experience when you log in to play Rune-Spice; even the smallest of details have been incorporated into our game to provide the same look and feel from the era that we feel was the peak of Rs2 Emulation.
Developers -Anthony -Shawn -Dj -Tanner
[IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/7.png[/img] [IMG]http://rune-spice.com/pics/8.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Rune-Spice 2007 REMAKE
item.dc:creator: @pure_k01 pure k0
item.description:
@pure_k01 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:4, topic:493357”]Lol that’s ironic, I have a feeling now that RuneScape is back with their older version people are going to start doing what people did above.

OT: Good luck with the development, and wish for the best.[/quote]

Well thanks and to the kids telling me to play rs07 why would i pay when i could play this that can keep me satisfied for free?

Read full topic
